name: Astro Assemble: Journey Beginning
description:
The game focuses on using puzzle mechanics alongside storytelling to produce an experience about restoring your broken spaceship after crashing into an unknown planet. The player's target is to discover secrets and information about the planet as they venture out for materials to fix their ship, giving them insight into the lives of the beings who occupied the area before.

Source Code: https://github.com/TSE-Game-Development/TSE_Project
